title: Knock Knock Door
summary: An interactive door experience with customizable styles and realistic knock sounds. Click to knock with different visual effects, animations, and Web Audio API-generated sound patterns.

title: The Philosopher's Library
summary: An immersive digital library featuring 100 essential philosophical texts with generative Three.js art backgrounds, interactive navigation, and contemplative reading experience.

title: NYC's Public AI Future
summary: Interactive plan for NYC-owned AI: phases, budget viz, roadmap, governance.

title: Portfolio Animation System
summary: A dynamic portfolio website featuring smooth animations, Three.js background effects, and responsive design. Built with React, TypeScript, and Framer Motion for seamless user interactions.

title: iOS Mobile Experience
summary: A progressive web app designed to feel native on iOS devices. Features offline caching, touch gestures, and app-like navigation patterns optimized for mobile users.

title: Circular Daily Planner
summary: An innovative daily planning interface with circular design patterns. Features task management, time blocking, priority settings, and export capabilities for personalized productivity management.

title: Fashion Palette Generator
summary: A creative tool for generating harmonious color palettes for fashion design. Upload any fashion image to extract beautiful color palettes for outfit coordination. All processing happens locally - your images never leave your device.

title: AI Brainwave Simulator
summary: Privacy-first neural activity visualization. All processing happens locally in your browser. Features real-time brainwave pattern analysis with focus, relaxation, creativity, and alertness metrics.

title: Security Posture Dashboard
summary: Enterprise-level security implementation for static websites. Achieves 95% security score through comprehensive protection mechanisms including CSP, security headers, and zero attack surface architecture.
